   +----org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleTableRow. RowAttribs
public class SimpleTableRow.RowAttribs
extends Object
This class allows row attributes to be accessed within a WM template in a straightforward way. E.g., $row.Attribute.bgColor or $row.Attribute.fontSize.
